au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=4; L2=1.5m_offset and 5 mm aperture
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(700,300) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 5 mm sics.drive('apx', -23) # Drive beamstops up selBs(3)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(39.5, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(39.5, 0) driveBsz(262.5)
